Class DetonateBobberyBombBattleEvent

A Battle Event when Bobbery Bombs are detonated. They damage all BattleEntities around them, including other Bobbery Bombs.

This is a Battle Event because this occurs after some other events (Ex. Status Effects) and after another bomb takes explosive damage, causing it to detonate earlier than usual.
